name: epic-timer
description: A timer for speedcubing with auto sync with the cloud.

scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development nodemon app.js -e ejs,js,css & npx tailwindcss -i frontend/css/tailwind.css -o public/css/style.css --watch & npm -prefix frontend/ run watch
scripts.production: npx tailwindcss -i frontend/css/tailwind.css -o public/css/style.css --minify & npm -prefix frontend/ run production & NODE_ENV=production node app.js
